sections.title: What I love
sections.content:
What actually makes a good front end developer?
If all you're looking for is a dev that "can make it look like the mockups" you're going to end up with the dude who did the W3Schools HTML course and heard that everyone uses Bootstrap.

There's another type of developer out there though - one who cares about user experience; who understands and reinforces the intent behind a design and produces a robust site that, against all odds, looks better than the mocks, all with a little magic sprinkled on top.

I build super-fast sites without resorting to 'fake fixes'. Sites that just work - and they look great, no matter what device you use.
I love seeing a spot in a design to add some JUICE and then sitting down with a designer to make it happen. I'm collaborative, I'm flexible, I'm whatever spicy marketing term you want to apply to me.
Designs entrusted to me are in good hands.

sections.title: What I do
list: Intelligent solutions in PHP / Laravel Blade
And a heap of other stuff - I'm super quick at learning new languages / frameworks too
